body:
i get the following error:
```
==> Building py-mpmath [PythonPackage]
==> Executing phase : 'build'
==> Error: TypeError: 'str' object is not callable
/Users/davydden/spack/lib/spack/spack/build_systems/python.py:115, in setup_py:
     112      def setup_py(self, *args):
     113          setup = self.setup_file()
     114
  >> 115          with working_dir(self.build_directory()):
     116              self.python(setup, '--no-user-cfg', *args)
```
title: python: str object is not callable
